StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_UpdateMUDCordData]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
/* --- CREATE POPULATE TABLE TEMP_UPDATE_ZIPS CREATE TABLE #TEMP_UPDATE_ZIPS ( ZIP VARCHAR(9) NOT NULL CONSTRAINT [PK_TEMP_UPDATEZIPS] PRIMARY KEY WITH FILLFACTOR = 30 )
INSERT INTO #TEMP_UPDATE_ZIPS SELECT MS.ZIP FROM MUD_STAGING MS WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM MUD_NEW_ZIPCODES MN WHERE MN.ZIP = MS.ZIP) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM MUD_ARCHIVED_ZIPCODES MA WHERE MA.ZIP = MS.ZIP) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM MUD_REACTIVATE_ZIPCODES MV WHERE MV.ZIP = MS.ZIP)
--- UPDATE MUD FILE BASED ON ZIPCODES UPDATE MUD_FILE SET LAT = MS.LATITUDE, LONG = MS.LONGITUDE FROM #TEMP_UPDATE_ZIPS TS, MUD_FILE MF WHERE TS.ZIP = MF.ZIP
SELECT * FROM MUD_FILE */
UPDATE MUD_FILE SET LAT = MS.LATITUDE, LONG = MS.LONGITUDE FROM MUD_FILE MF INNER JOIN MUD_STAGING MS ON MF.ZIP = MS.ZIP AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM MUD_NEW_ZIPCODES MN WHERE MN.ZIP = MS.ZIP) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM MUD_ARCHIVED_ZIPCODES MA WHERE MA.ZIP = MS.ZIP) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM MUD_REACTIVATE_ZIPCODES MV WHERE MV.ZIP = MS.ZIP)
---DROP TABLE #TEMP_UPDATE_ZIPS
SET NOCOUNT OFF
